explanation: [0-0] On a beach with fluffy white clouds dotting the sky, a kite surfer crouches halfway on the sand, in front of a wooden structure with a roof. He is holding a white kitesurfing control bar, and a green and yellow kite flies in the air.
[0-3] The kite surfer skillfully maneuvers the kite, using the wind to pull himself upwards, leaving the ground and stepping onto the top of the roofed wooden structure.

[3-6] Then, the kite surfer leaps over the roofed wooden structure, his feet leaving the ground and floating forward in the air.
